definitions.definition: A chigoe ( Tunga penetrans ), a kind of flea found in tropical climates.
A harvest mite ( Trombiculidae spp.), a very small, red mite endemic to the Midwestern and Southeastern US, the infestation of which causes intense itching .

main_definition: A chigoe ( Tunga penetrans ), a kind of flea found in tropical climates.
secondary_definitions: A harvest mite ( Trombiculidae spp.), a very small, red mite endemic to the Midwestern and Southeastern US, the infestation of which causes intense itching .

definitions.definition: An East Asian person who behaves in ways similar to a stereotypical urban African American .
definitions.label_groups: US , slang , derogatory , offensive , ethnic slur

main_definition: ( US , slang , derogatory , offensive , ethnic slur ) An East Asian person who behaves in ways similar to a stereotypical urban African American .
